job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job DescriptionTitle: Site Reliability EngineerLocation: Beaverton, Oregon (97008) / Remote OptionEmployment Type: Direct Hire (no c2c or sponsorship available)Job DescriptionEdgeLink is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) to join an expanding team focused on connecting business to cloud applications and environments. From a skills perspective we are targeting most of the following:Bachelor' s degree or equivalent practical experienceExperience supporting development environments that include Linux tools, Bamboo, Puppet, Terraform, AWS, and AzureDeep understanding of the Unix/Linux operating systems, including kernel networking packet flowStrong understanding of network fundamentals, including tunnelingWorking knowledge of SQL databasesExperience with algorithms and data structures are a nice to haveEdgelink would like to thank all applicants, however only those who qualify for an interview will be contacted.EdgeLink is an equal opportunity employer.Job RequirementsSRE, DevOps, Site Reliability, CI/CD, Cloud, Azure, AWS, Linux, Bamboo, Puppet, Terraform, Unix, Networking, Tunneling, SQL, Database, Algorithm, Data Structure, VPN
